log.observation:
Travel Plan: 

Day 1:
- Accommodation: 
  - Name: Fairfield Inn & Suites Philadelphia Downtown/Center City
    Address: 261 South 13th Street

- Breakfast:
  - Name: Reading Terminal Market (variety of affordable options)
    Address: 51 N 12th St

- Morning Attraction: 
  - Name: Independence National Historical Park
    Address: 143 S 3rd St

- Lunch: 
  - Name: Masala Kitchen Kati Rolls and Platters
    Address: 1115 Walnut St

- Afternoon Attraction: 
  - Name: Liberty Bell Center
    Address: 6th St & Chestnut St
  - Name: Independence Visitor Center
    Address: 599 Market St

- Dinner: 
  - Name: Ekta Indian Cuisine
    Address: 1142 Crease St

- Night Attraction: 
  - Name: Wonderspaces Philadelphia
    Address: 27 N 11th St


Day 2:
- Breakfast:
  - Name: Reading Terminal Market (variety of affordable options)
    Address: 51 N 12th St

- Morning Attraction: 
  - Name: Please Touch Museum (Children's Museum - not in original list, but highly recommended for families)
    Address: Memorial Hall, 4231 Avenue of the Republic

- Lunch:
  - Name: Saad's Halal Restaurant (Offers Indian/Pakistani cuisine at good value)
    Address: 4500 Walnut St

- Afternoon Attraction: 
  - Name: Smith Memorial Playground & Playhouse
    Address: 3500 Reservoir Dr
  - Name: Schuylkill Banks
    Address: 2501 Walnut St, Ste 206

- Dinner: 
  - Name: New Delhi Indian Restaurant
    Address: 4004 Chestnut St

- Night Attraction: 
  - Name: Boathouse Row (scenic walk along the river)
    Address: 1 Boathouse Row


Day 3:
- Breakfast:
  - Name: Reading Terminal Market (variety of affordable options)
    Address: 51 N 12th St

- Morning Attraction: 
  - Name: Philadelphia Zoo (Not in original list, but a classic family attraction)
    Address: 3400 W Girard Ave

- Lunch:
  - Name: Amma's South Indian Cuisine
    Address: 1518 Chestnut St

- Afternoon Attraction: 
  - Name:  Wissahickon Valley Park
    Address: Valley Green Rd At Wissahickon
  - Name: Woodmere Art Museum
    Address: 9201 Germantown Ave

- Dinner:
  - Name: Mood Cafe
    Address: 4618 Baltimore Ave

- Night Attraction:
  - Name:  Please Touch Museum (If not visited on Day 2)
    Address: Memorial Hall, 4231 Avenue of the Republic


Day 4:
- Breakfast:
  - Name: Reading Terminal Market (variety of affordable options)
    Address: 51 N 12th St

- Morning Attraction:
  - Name:  Franklin Square (Not in original list, but has a carousel, mini golf, and playground)
    Address: 200 N 6th St

- Lunch:
  - Name: Masala Kitchen Kati Rolls and Platters
    Address: 1115 Walnut St

- Afternoon Attraction:
  - Name:  National Liberty Museum
    Address: 321 Chestnut St
  - Name:  Benjamin Franklin Museum
    Address: 317 Chestnut St

- Dinner: 
  - Name: IndeBlue Modern Indian Food & Spirits
    Address: 205 South 13th St


Note: This itinerary prioritizes family-friendly activities and affordable options.  The Philadelphia Zoo and Please Touch Museum are strong recommendations for families, even though they weren't in the provided attraction list.  Consider purchasing a Philadelphia CityPASS for potential discounts on some attractions.  Public transportation is a cost-effective way to get around.
